sensing.not-color-touch-color: The condition didn't evaluate to true

variable.not-have-value: The variable didn't have the value {value}

answer.draw-attention-to-block-answers:
Do you need an explanation for a block? Then click on the
?
next to it!

positive.block-executed-with-value: and thereby the {blockType}-block was executed with value {value}.
positive.block-executed-with-rotation-style: and thereby the {blockType}-block was executed with rotation style {rotationStyle}.
positive.block-executed-with-value-with-rotation-: and thereby the {blockType}-block was executed with value {value} and with rotation style {rotationStyle}.
positive.multiple-behavior-blocks: , because the execution of {count} {blockType}-blocks caused this behavior.
positive.turn-right: the {blockType}-block changed the direction from a negative to a positive value and because the rotation style was 'left-right'.
positive.turn-left: the {blockType}-block changed the direction from a positive to a negative value and because the rotation style was 'left-right'.

negative.single-behavior-block-unexecuted: and thereby the {blockType}-block was not executed.
negative.single-possible-behavior-block-unexecute: and thereby the {blockType}-block that could lead to the behavior was not executed.
negative.control-flow-interrupted: and therefore all subsequent blocks that could lead to the behavior were not executed.
negative.all-behavior-blocks-unexecuted: , because none of the {count} {blockType}-blocks was executed.
negative.all-possible-behavior-blocks-unexecuted: , because none of the {count} {blockType}-blocks that could lead to the behavior was executed.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed: , because the executed {blockType}-block didn't lead to that behavior.
negative.some-behavior-blocks-executed: , because none of the executed {blockType}-blocks led to that behavior.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-wrong-input: , because the executed {blockType}-block wasn't called with value {expectedInput}.
negative.some-behavior-blocks-executed-wrong-inpu: , because none of the executed {blockType}-blocks was called with value {expectedInput}.
negative.some-behavior-blocks-executed-no-change: , because none of the executed {blockType}-blocks changed {attribute}.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-not-turn-pos: , because the {blockType}-block wasn't executed with a positive value.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-not-turn-neg: , because the {blockType}-block wasn't executed with a negative value.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-rotation-sty: , because the {blockType}-block was executed with the rotation style {rotationStyle}.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-wrong-rotati: , because the {blockType}-block was not executed with the rotation style {rotationStyle}.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-no-left-to-r: , because the executed {blockType}-block didn't change the direction from a negative to a positive value.
negative.one-behavior-block-executed-no-right-to-: , because the executed {blockType}-block didn't change the direction from a positive to a negative value.
negative.one-behavior-block-unexecuted: Another {blockType}-block that would lead to the behavior was not executed.
negative.one-possible-behavior-block-unexecuted: Another {blockType}-block that could lead to the behavior was not executed.
negative.some-behavior-blocks-unexecuted: {count} other {blockType}-blocks that would lead to the behavior were not executed.
negative.some-possible-behavior-blocks-unexecuted: {count} other {blockType}-blocks that could lead to the behavior were not executed.
negative.variable-value-set-but-changed-afterward: The variable was set to {value}, but changed afterwards.
negative.list-item-removed: The list contained the item {item}, but it was deleted.
negative.block-not-reachable: , because the block that could lead to the behavior is not reachable!
negative.blocks-not-reachable: , because none of the blocks that could lead to the behavior is reachable!

sensing.touching-sprite-edge: Sprite {sprite} touched the edge at the positions highlighted in red in the picture.
sensing.touching-sprite-mouse:
Sprite {sprite} touched the mouse-pointer as shown in the picture.
The mouse-pointer was at position ({mouseX},{mouseY}).
sensing.touching-sprite-sprite: Sprite {sprite1} and sprite {sprite2} touched each other at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.touching-sprite-color: Sprite {sprite} touched the selected color at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.touching-color-color: The colors touched each other at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.distance-sprite-edge: The minimal distance from sprite {sprite} to the edge was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-mouse: The minimal distance from sprite {sprite} to the mouse-pointer at position ({mouseX},{mouseY}) was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-sprite: The minimal distance from sprite {sprite1} to sprite {sprite2} was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-color: The minimal distance from sprite {sprite} to the selected color was {distance}.
sensing.distance-color-color: The minimal distance of the colors was {distance}.
sensing.sprite-invisible: Sprite {sprite} can not be touched, because it is invisible!
sensing.sprites-invisible: Sprite {sprite1} and sprite {sprite2} can not touch each other, because they are invisible!
sensing.nonexistent-color:
The color ⬤ does not occur!
Try to select the desired color with the color picker.
sensing.nonexistent-colors:
The colors ⬤ and ⬤ do not occur!
Try to select the desired colors with the color picker.

reason.clone-created: a clone of sprite {sprite} was created
reason.not-clone-created: a clone of sprite {sprite} wasn't created
reason.clone-started: the sprite {sprite} started as a clone
reason.not-clone-started: the sprite {sprite} didn't start as a clone
reason.go-to-related-mouse: the sprite went to the mouse-pointer
reason.go-to-related-random: the sprite went to a random position
reason.direction-set-related-mouse: the sprite pointed towards the mouse-pointer
reason.next-costume: the costume switched to the next costume
reason.next-backdrop: the backdrop switched to the next backdrop
reason.list-insert: the item {item} was inserted at position {index}
reason.list-replace: the item at position {index} was replaced by {item}
reason.list-delete-at: the item at position {index} was deleted
reason.clone-start-value: the value was {initialValue} when the clone was created
reason.clone-start-visibility: the original sprite was {initialVisibility} when the clone was created and the clone inherited this property
reason.observation-start-value: the value at the observation start was {initialValue}
reason.observation-start-visibility: the visibility at the observation start was {initialVisibility}
